hero.title: Nehal Nadaf
hero.subtitle: Creating content that helps brands grow, convert, and build authority.

about.heading: Bringing Your Vision to Life | 4+ Years of Experience
about.description: With 4+ years of experience in video editing and post-production, I specialize in creating engaging content that resonates with audiences. From viral Instagram Reels to cinematic YouTube videos, I bring technical expertise and creative vision to every project.

services.title: Instagram Reels Editing
services.description: Fast-paced, engaging vertical content optimized for maximum reach and engagement. Trending effects, dynamic transitions, and viral-worthy edits.

services.title: YouTube Video Editing
services.description: Professional long-form content editing with pacing, graphics, and storytelling that keeps viewers engaged from start to finish.

services.title: Color Grading
services.description: Cinematic color correction and grading to give your footage a professional, polished look that matches your brand aesthetic.

services.title: Commercial & Ads
services.description: High-impact commercial editing for brands and businesses. Attention-grabbing content that drives conversions and brand awareness.

services.title: Motion Graphics
services.description: Custom motion graphics, lower thirds, titles, and animated elements to elevate your content and enhance storytelling.

services.title: Documentary Editing
services.description: Thoughtful, narrative-driven editing for documentaries and long-form content. Crafting compelling stories that inform and inspire.
